CLIENT PORTFOLIO

I've been working in web design, since 2014 focusing mainly on WordPress front-end development and design customization. My involvement on the projects below include tasks such as design, coding mock-ups, customizing existing themes, integrating marketing tools, and maintenance.

LingoMod.com

An extensive modification of a prebuilt theme and custom WordPress plugins to integrate the clients' sites with specific needs such as customized search results and the integration of a newsletter subscription and a third-party chat feature.

Learn More Visit Website

StephanSpencer.com

PSD to WordPress theme and expansion of the theme's functionality for further content, landing pages integration with marketing tools, and a membership section with video courses.

Learn More Visit Website

OrionsMethod.com

PSD to WordPress theme, as well as customization and expansion of the website to integrate podcast show section, including featured episode slider, index pages, and shownotes.

Learn More Visit Website

MarketingSpeak.com

Designed layout and coded provided mock-up for podcast show including featured episodes slider, index pages, shownotes and landing page.

Learn More Visit Website

OptimizedGeek.com

Designed layout and coded provided mock-up for podcast show including featured episodes slider, index pages, shownotes and landing page.

Learn More Visit Website

Recorders.com

Customized e-commerce WordPress theme to implement provided design branding guidelines.

Learn More Visit Website

Designed and developed a custom WordPress theme of an industrial design and illustration portfolio.

Learn More Visit Website
